mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ella B. Washington to James Hollingsworth, 1881 April 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Ella Bassett, 1834-1898
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ella B. Washington, Vice Regent for West Virginia, to James Hollingsworth, superintendent, April 2, 1881. Nordington. Asks about new boat. Saw Mrs. Hudson in New York. Asks for measurements of room above Council Room, will complete furnishing it for West Virginia. Sympathizes with Regent, so soon a widow again. Will give Miss Johnson facts for Mount Vernon.
